Articles.Content: Post pics of your fursuit or your fursona! Who are you on the outside and in the inside? I'm a Wolf or playful cat. Who are you. Also, No furry haters.

As with the Bronies, the Furries can have ONE thread, all Furry content is to reside here and here alone, but any hating will be dealt with

That applies to all parties involved

Have fun and don't start arguments!
Thanks sal
I knew it was only a matter of time before you guys showed up xD

We've been here, just took a while before this thread started.

Unless this is a re-do.

We've been here, just took a while before this thread started.

Unless this is a re-do.

It's a re-do of the thread that existed that got eaten in the forum rollback.

Keep it clean and there will be no problems.
And I thought mechjeb debate threads got messy...

(its just a joke pls dont kill meeeee)

Edited May 1, 2013 by Nutt007
@IIamatoes and Nutt007 why can you tolerate Bronys but not Furrys?
Its not that I can't tolerate Bronies, I enjoy watching MLP, but I don't consider myself a Brony, and I was just commenting on how the Poop was rocketing paddlewards.

@IIamatoes and Nutt007 why can you tolerate Bronys but not Furrys?

Posting about a TV show is different than posting about a sexual fetish.

Probably why this thread is stillborn. He makes a good point. Lets try to be civil.

I may not like what may be posted here, but ill fight for their right to post it.

im pretty sure the furry people and the bronies have their "encounters" too.

(there is seriously wicked stuff out there about MLP)
Oh my god, no thank you.

@IIamatoes and Nutt007 why can you tolerate Bronys but not Furrys?

Bronies and furries are the same, they are both equally as annoying too.
Just leave this Thread if you don't like them.

i do not want to spread any hate here, but Trux's link source seems fairly biased towards furries. (i'll admit i am biased too, but more negative.)

But hell, if they want a thread here, why not, as long as it doesn't become a weird cybering orgy.

i do not want to spread any hate here, but Trux's link source seems fairly biased towards furries. (i'll admit i am biased too, but more negative.)

But hell, if they want a thread here, why not, as long as it doesn't become a weird cybering orgy.

It would be biased, that is why I posted it...? People have the right to express themselves in whatever (Legal) way they want.

I doubt it would turn into anything sexual, after all that is against the rules. Might be also handy to point out that Furry(ism?) is not a sexual fetish, that would be yiffing if I remember my Sociology A level* correctly :S

*As a subculture is was to be studied comparatively with other subcultures and sadly yes did go into that much detail...
